bibl.title: Pharaonic-Style Decoration in the Mammisi at Ismant el-Kharab: New Insights after the 1996-1997 Field Season.
Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons

bibl.seg: KAPER Olaf E., Pharaonic-Style Decoration in the Mammisi at Ismant el-Kharab: New Insights after the 1996-1997 Field Season.

Colin A. HOPE and Gillian E. BOWEN (Edd.), Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 11 (Oxford - Oakville, Connecticut, 2002) pp. 217-223, 3 figg.
